resources.string: This VTOP Chennai application is completely free and does not contain any ads. The VTOP Chennai Portal service is provided by VIT Chennai.
This application is a third-party service, meaning this application is owned and maintained by an individual and NOT by VIT Chennai.

All necessary data such as your VTOP username, password and the data collected from the VTOP Chennai portal is ONLY stored locally on your device. I DO NOT collect or disclose any information entered by you or downloaded from the VTOP Chennai Portal.
If you have any questions or suggestions, my contact information is available at https://therealsuji.tk.
